ISSUE.TITLE: Dropdown box for "::filter" options should be text+autocomplete
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently it's a plain drop-down box, which becomes very inconvenient once you have more than 10 options to select from. A better solution will be a text input field, with autocompletions to the available options as-you-type.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Use select2 for filters, for autocomplete and multiple selection (#161, #160)
